Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI

Class Viewer

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI.Viewer
public class Viewer extends javafx.application.Application
This is the main class of the GUI. It has all the methods called by the GUI Controller to refresh the GUI
